title: Rag Doll
description: Forward bends, Inversions, Standing Primary body parts engaged Lower Back, Middle Back / Lats, Shoulders, Spine, Upper Back & Lower Traps Stretches low back and spine Massages abdominal organs Calms mind, relieves stress How to perform Rag Doll Stand with your feet hip distance apart, feet parallel. Bend your knees and fold forward from your hips with an exhale. Cross your arms and hold opposite elbows. Round your back and let your head hang. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Release your hands with an exhale. Roll up to standing with an inhale.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
